column5: Don and Ruth Gimmer stopped by today on their travels through Ohio, always good to see them. They got nice dry weather for travel, a bit warm though.
Don and Ruth are super people, Paul. Glad you had a nice visit.
They spent the weekend here at my place a couple months back too Paul, then we vacationed with them at Lakair a few weeks ago along with another couple.
Roy, Lew, it`s not the first time they have stopped in, super people and always welcome. It gives them a chan ce to get a break from driving.

I get a few visits a year from Don and Ruth, always welcome and always good company.  Are they on they way down for striper fishing Paul? I usually score a fillet or two when they do. Mmmmmm, stripers, nice eating fish.

I don`t believe so, they said the were heading to Lancaster Ohio to visit friends. Not much Striper fishing here in Ohio. I know they used to go to Cumberland lake in Tennessee? I believe it has problems with it`s dam though, so trips there maybe on hold?
